title: Always the Baker, Never the Bride
description: They say you can t have your cake and eat it too. But who would want a cake they couldn t eat? Just ask Emma Rae Travis about that. A baker of confections who is diabetic and can t enjoy them. When Emma meets Jackson Drake, the escapee from Corporate America who is starting a wedding destination hotel to fulfill a dream that belonged to someone else, this twosome and their crazy family ties bring new meaning to the term "family circus." The Atlanta social scene will never be the same!
author: Sandra D. Bricker
